Measure and invocation:

In the dawn of Yuanshi’s unfolding, the Great Mystery first stirred.
From the Void’s extremity, formless, a single qi flowed into shape.
It transformed into the Two Radiant Ones, the Five Wefts congealed in essence.
Merging with spontaneity, it dissolved the knotted fetters of rebirth.
Gathering the perfected, it spread qi, blazing through the Nine Pures.
Flaming and vast, it aligned the Seven Epochs as one.
The Celestial Master dwells in the boundless, the Cinnabar Heaven gleams crystalline.
Vermilion fire refines and delivers, crimson mists scatter brilliance.
The Three Flowers flourish in splendor, their radiance illuminating the Imperial Dawn.

*Proclamation of the Primordial Vermilion Text Formula*
Ministry of Numinous Treasure Great Rites.

On this day of the present month, in reverent observance of the Dao’s decree, the Vermilion Text is bestowed to transcend and deliver the departed souls, that they may ascend to the Heavenly Halls.

Inscribe the Celestial Seal of the Chaotic Abyss Vermilion Text, and present to the right the *Precious Chapter of the Primordial Vermilion Text of the Chaotic Abyss*, universally proclaiming to the ten directions, the Three Realms, the Five Marchmounts, and the Nine Netherworlds. Illuminate the long night, transcend the departed souls, and let them ascend directly to the Heaven of Brahma-Conduct, avoiding the depths of the Heavy Yin.

The Vermilion Text blazes forth, wind and fire unceasing, all in accordance with the proclaimed command.

In the cyclical year, month, and day, the proclamation is issued.
The ordained official, [Name], in humble receipt of the decree, carries it forth.

The Jade Clarity Supreme Minister, the Great Luo Boundless Divine Duke, resides in Heaven.

The three proclamations are to be sealed and used accordingly. At the noon audience of each of the three days, one proclamation is to be issued, in accordance with the canonical rites. Alternatively, a single issuance may suffice.

The Mystic Master states:
The wondrous transformation of the Supreme Ultimate, the divine and numinous *Chaotic Abyss Vermilion Text*, was bestowed upon the Heavenly Perfected Sovereign by the Jade Prosperity Ascending Victory Heaven, who in turn transmitted the Numinous Treasure Great Rites to the Vacuous August Heavenly Worthy.

Addressing the Eastern Florescence Supreme Minister and Cavern Spirit Grand Master, who oversees the Left Bureau of the Lower Register of the Living and all the immortal officials, he declared:
The Nine Empyreans govern the Brahma-totality, and the Eight Emperors rule the heavens. Without the *Chaotic Abyss Vermilion Text*, one cannot gather and transform the Nine Yangs nor illuminate the celestial deliverance.

Thus:
The Divine Empyrean Jade Clarity Vacuous August Heaven suffuses the numinous radiance of the Nine Yangs, the pure and vacuous Brahma-qi, to form its celestial realm.

The Cinnabar Empyrean Southern Culmen Jade Text Heaven suffuses the cinnabar numinous and wondrous governance of the Cavern Yang radiant true and primordial Brahma-qi to form its celestial realm.

The Azure Empyrean Supreme Vacuity True Culmination Heaven suffuses the vast numinous and grandly flourishing primordial Yang and true numinous unity-qi to form its celestial realm.

The Jade Empyrean Jade Numinous Plain Florescence Heaven suffuses the jade numinous plain florescence pure Yang and utmost true primordial unity-qi to form its celestial realm.

The Supreme Empyrean Supreme Vacuity True Primordial Heaven suffuses the grandly numinous Cavern Florescence Three Yangs and Nine True Supreme Unity-qi to form its celestial realm.

The Jade Empyrean Plain Numinous Luminous Primordial Heaven suffuses the plain numinous luminous florescence Six Yangs and Cavern True Utmost Unity-qi to form its celestial realm.

The Purple Empyrean Mystic Numinous Supreme Culmination Heaven suffuses the primordial numinous purple florescence pure Yang and wondrous true Heavenly Unity-qi to form its celestial realm.

The Radiant Empyrean Wondrous Numinous Treasure Florescence Heaven suffuses the wondrous numinous treasure florescence radiant Yang and essence true vacuous unity-qi to form its celestial realm.

The Azure Empyrean Jade Florescence Boundless Heaven suffuses the azure numinous jade florescence primordial Yang and Heavenly true pure unity-qi to form its celestial realm.

The Vermilion Text transforms the Chaotic Abyss, and the Chaotic Abyss transforms the Amorphous Vastness. This is the Dao of the Nine Qi of the Primordial Heaven, descending to the Nine Causes, and even to the Eight Brahma True Words—all are transformations of this text.

Within the Great Cinnabar Field lies the Imperial Palace, the Wondrous Profit City, and the World of Worthies. This is the domain governed by the Vermilion Emperor of the Brahma Treasure and Cinnabar Numinosity. Within it are the Vermilion Mound Prefecture, the Flowing Fire Courtyard, the Blazing Fire Palace, the Vermilion Radiance Hall, the Cinnabar Mound Fire Pool, and the place where the Heavenly Worthy of Primordial Beginning refines the true text into Brahma-transformations. The middle, lower, and two true ones of heaven cannot attain this.

I now bestow upon you this *Chaotic Abyss Brahma-Primordial Diagram* along with the text. Henceforth, the Six Heavens will align in harmonious motion. In the *ren-chen* year, the conjunction of deliverance shall occur; in the *geng-zi* year, governance and transformation shall naturally unfold. Its secret and wondrous talismanic texts and responses are all beyond measure.

The three register writs are proclaimed separately over three mornings.
Use cypress wood slips, adorned with three-colored gold script in the customary manner, stored in azure bags.

*Register for Ascending to Heaven*
Method states: When inscribing the register, face east, burn incense, and visualize the *Jade Dawn Emperor*, performing the rite with proper intent.
Next, recite the register’s sacred title, grinding cinnabar eighty-one turns left and right.
Then draw the *Azure Mystery Qi* into the cinnabar.
When inscribing the register, first recite the *Scripture of the Numinous Treasure* once, then kneel and invoke:
*Your subordinate, [Name], with reverent trepidation, bows head to ground in prostration.*
Petitioning the *Three Clarities*, the *Three Realms’ Great Dao*, the *Compassionate Honored One*, the *Central Heaven Emperor*:
*Your subordinate petitions on behalf of the intent herein, humbly beseeching the granting of deliverance.*
*Your subordinate now inscribes the register in accordance with the formula, entreating the descent of celestial grace to aid below, the flow of true qi, the unsealing of the writ, and the bestowal of the register for inscription and distribution as prescribed.*
*May the nether prisons cease their sorrows, and the dead souls receive deliverance.*
*Your subordinate’s heart is overwhelmed with fervent devotion, to the utmost of earnest prayer.*
Next, perform nine bows, visualizing the *Heavenly Gate* opening.
The *Heavenly Gate* is a triple-gated golden portal, resplendent with golden light, within which stands a golden palace hall.
The *Jade Dawn Emperor* sits enthroned therein, flanked by attendant perfected ones arrayed around the imperial seat.
Present the preceding matters, and the Emperor’s compassionate countenance brightens with joy.
By imperial decree, the *Golden Lads and Jade Maidens* bear the treasure casket, descending through a hundredfold radiance to the writing desk, merging with the prepared register.
Light lingers above, boundless and inexhaustible.
Next, face south and perform nine bows, silently petitioning the *Southern Dipper*.
Visualize the six stars, each vast as the solar wheel in its rising aspect, converging and descending to merge with the six stars of the register, each star bearing a distinct character within, fully luminous and transparent, their brilliance unified.
Next, offer incense and strike the teeth twelve times.
Incantation:
*Within is the immortal spirit who delivers the dead,*
*Within is the Southern Culmen’s Lord of Longevity,*
*Within is the Great Spirit Sima who delivers the world,*
*Within is the Life-Loving Elder Han,*
*Within are the Southern Superintendents of Destiny and Registers.*
*Extending life and increasing years, deliverers from calamity, revered spirits.*
*Restoring bones and reviving the dead, immeasurable deliverers of humanity.*
*Hasten as the Emperor’s statutes command!*

After the incantation, kneel facing the *Heavenly Gate*, visualizing the official youths and attendants encircling you.
With the left hand form the *Director’s Seal*, and with the right hand hold the brush, reciting the empowering absolution and the secret incantation fifty times.
Incantation:
*Supreme Mystery’s Primal One, Most High Dao Lord.*
*Command your subordinate to enact the talisman,*
*illuminating and shattering the nether prisons,*
*liberating the sinful souls.*
*Hasten as the statutes command!*

Next, draw the *Heavenly Gate’s* azure, yellow, and white *qi* into the brush and inscribe according to the formula.
First write the four characters of the *Jade Dawn’s* secret taboo name, then intersperse them beneath the six stars, reciting as you write:
Incantation:
*Primal Beginning’s talismanic mandate,*
*appointing the hour of ascent.*
*The deceased soul receives deliverance,*
*immediately ascending to heaven.*
*Hasten as the Primal Beginning Emperor’s statutes command!*
Twelve times, drawing the *Heavenly Gate’s qi* to release the brush and form the heart seal.
Recite again:
Incantation:
*Most High Dao Lord,*
*by decree dispatching Kunlun.*
*One talismanic stroke*
*delivers the dead soul.*
*Hasten as the statutes command!*

With the *Heavenly Gate’s* golden light *qi*, form the *Jade Clarity Seal* and trace the six stars on the register, leaving only the third *Kui* star unfilled—
for emptiness of fire yields clarity.
Empowering incantation for the talisman:
*The Six Perfected of the Southern Dipper,*
*emerging from darkness into the nether realms.*
*By imperial decree I command,*
*swiftly overseeing the living spirits.*
*Inscribed in the Southern Prosperity’s register,*
*immediately returning the soul.*
*Hasten as the Emperor’s decree commands!*

Proceed as before, using the *Southern Dipper’s qi* seal to suffuse luminous clarity.
Then employ the empowering incantation to consecrate it, again with the *Emperor’s Seal* and the *Three Heavens’ qi*, sealing the four characters below.

*Formula for the Lesser Register of Ascending to Heaven*
*By the Most High’s decree absolving the Register for Ascending to Heaven:*
*The deceased soul receives deliverance,*
*refined and reborn,*
*the human lineage unbroken,*
*blessings and retribution transformed and increased.*

Right: Presenting the *Register*,
proclaimed to the *Ten Directions and Three Realms*,
the nether officials and masters,
delivering the *Three Realms’ Ten Classes*,
the *Six Paths and Four Births*,
the *Nine Provinces’ Five Lineages*,
the male and female souls of the nether realms—
ascending to *Heaven’s Halls*,
all in accordance...

**Divine Talisman—**
The talisman is issued to dissolve grievances, release karmic bonds, seek liberation from vengeful spirits, and resolve all confrontations and transgressions. May all malevolent karma cease, and the departed escape the Cold Courts of Hell. Let the roots of sin be eradicated, as decreed.

**At the Palace of the Eastern Extremity, the Heavenly Worthy of Great Unity’s Salvation from Suffering, the Azure Mystery Supreme Emperor.**

**Purport of the Vermilion Mound’s Refinement and Mysterious Directive—**
The master sits in tranquil repose, calming the hundred cares. Within the Mud-Pill Palace atop his own head—the Celestial Abyss of the Heavenly Valley—light illumines within and without. There, the Heavenly Worthy of Great Unity sits upon a throne of gold and jade, clad in azure robes, vermilion slippers, a cloud-wrought crown, and holding a jade scepter. A halo encircles his neck, and golden lotuses bear his feet. Presently, the Heavenly Worthy radiates the luminous brilliance of a hundred treasures, illuminating the eight directions.

Then, with one’s own nature, one ascends to pay homage to the Heavenly Worthy, reverently reciting his sacred name. Suddenly, purple qi descends from the palace like threads, settling into the cinnabar field, coalescing into a luminous orb the size of a pellet, resplendent in purplish-gold. Let one’s nature ever abide within the Heavenly Valley atop the crown, never allowing it to scatter.

In the midst of this true visualization, the form is suddenly forgotten, stillness pervades, and clarity extends above and below. Whether walking, standing, sitting, or reclining, one may cultivate this practice. This is the Dao of refining form and spirit to attain unity.

When the purple qi enters the cinnabar field, it naturally generates the true fire of radiant essence—this is the work of primordial yang qi. As it is said: *When the Great Unity resides in the head, the myriad spirits pay homage.* The divine luminaries stand guard with mighty power, subduing all demonic and malevolent forces, which dare not oppose.

When spirit and qi flourish, illness vanishes forever. Whatever is sought or undertaken shall be instantly answered. For it is by refining qi with spirit, and spirit with form, that both form and spirit attain perfection, and the body merges with spontaneity. Gathering the myriad methods into the One True, dispersing the One True into the ten thousand scenes—no longer bound by existence or non-existence, forever transcending birth and death—this is the True Person.

Those who receive this method shall burn incense, face east, and kneel in reverence. Visualize one’s true nature, disclosing past and present transgressions and karmic errors. Release the nine generations of ancestors and the seven lineages of forebears, masters and fellow disciples, as well as all offenses in both yin and yang. Universally extend this deliverance to the six paths and four modes of birth—winged, crawling, submerged, and hidden—all shall be transformed and liberated.

Humbly beseech the Heavenly Worthy to bestow compassion, responding to devotion and effecting communion. May the minister’s heart be at peace, qi flourish, the spirit-chamber radiant, and the mysterious merit be accomplished. May no demonic trials arise, and may all ascend to the Realm of Eternal Joy, merging with the Dao in truth.

Thereafter, inscribe the talisman.

**Incantation for Empowering the Brush—**
By the Jade Mandate of the Primordial Beginning, the Dharma is spread and numinous power deployed. The Dao’s methods bestow grace, and those who receive the talisman transcend rebirth. Whatever transgressions and sins exist shall all be eradicated. Upon witnessing these jade words, the myriad spirits heed them.

**Incantation for Empowering the Vermilion—**
The jade tone gathers qi, the numinous wind assembles mist. The Purple Void flourishes in splendor, aiding the ten thousand immortals. A thousand harmonies, ten thousand unions—spontaneously perfected in truth. *Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Ordinance of the Numinous Treasure’s Salvation of Humanity!*

**Prayer Incantation—**
Through the Dharma-gate, guided along the Dharma-path, bathed in the divine spring, sprinkled with sweet dew—may the heart be purified, the form perfected, the voice exalted, and the spirit complete. Those who have never heard the Dharma-sound of the Heavenly Worthy shall now be enabled to hear it. Those who have never received the Heavenly Worthy’s benevolent grace shall now be enabled to encounter it. Attaining human or celestial rebirth, they shall follow the talisman to transcendence. *Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Ordinance!*

**The talisman on the right employs the Jade Clarity Mudra.** Draw the qi of the Celestial Gate and blow it onto the brush. Next, trace the Xun trigram’s pattern, recite the Heavenly Worthy of Great Unity’s Salvation from Suffering eighty-one times, and gather the Azure Mystery qi to blow onto the brush. Then recite *By the decree of the Heavenly Worthy of Great Unity’s Salvation from Suffering, execute the command* eighty-one times, drawing the Azure Mystery qi into the brush. Recite eighty-one times again, and once more draw the qi into the brush. Inscribe the talisman in accordance with the qi.

The Five Scripts unfold and expand, universally establishing the divine spirits. Without script, there is no illumination; without script, there is no clarity; without script, there is no establishment; without script, there is no completion; without script, there is no deliverance; without script, there is no birth. Within it resides the divine deliverer of the undying, the Southern Culmen’s Lord of Long Life, the Deliverer of the World Controller Sima, the Life-Cherishing Controller Han the Venerable, the Southern Upper Controllers of Destiny and Records, the Venerable Deities of Extended Lifespan and Increased Years, the Deliverers from Calamity, the Reanimators of the Dead, and the Immeasurable Deliverer of Humans.

After [Deceased] receives deliverance, the seven qi perfect the true, the six rites revolve in emptiness, the five numina continue the severed, the two luminaries support the weakened, the Big Dipper’s handle turns in the void, and steps are taken in flight through the cloud palaces. The embryo has a beginning, but the kalpas have no end. The Golden City nurtures the essence, the Jade Grotto congeals the spirit. The true qi is internally cultivated to become a perfected person. Above, one enters the Great Void; below, one penetrates the dark springs. Within the cloud palaces’ jeweled towers, the true soul resides. One enters and exits the land of blessings, circling the gate of life, chewing the numinous fungus, rinsing with the golden spring. Sweet dew flows in streams, showering the cinnabar field; purple auroras dawn and reflect, the three qi condense into mist. The jade chamber transforms into an immortal’s abode, seated serenely upon the golden lotus. The true countenance veils the sun, and the kalpas pass like years, all in accordance with the proclaimed mandate.

*Precious Canon of the Numinous Treasure, Scroll Twenty-Seven—*
*Proclamation and Bestowal of Talismans and Registers*

*The Register of Golden Writs for Life-Prolonging Deliverance*

*The Golden Register of the Highest Cavernous Mystery, Numinous Treasure, for Life-Prolonging Deliverance*

In the year of the cyclical sign [X], of the [X] district and [X] residence, [Name] humbly petitions for the intention of [Name].

Reverently approaching the Altar of the Yellow Register, [Name] is bestowed and entrusted with *The Golden Register of the Highest Cavernous Mystery, Numinous Treasure, for Life-Prolonging Deliverance*, First Grade, to be received and upheld.

To traverse the Three Realms, to ascend beyond the Nine Heavens.

As the scripture states: In primordial times, the Celestial Worthy of Original Beginning, dwelling in the Three Yuan Palace of the Ninefold Pure Wondrous Realm, expounded the most profound teachings amidst the great assembly, enlightening humans and devas. He recorded meritorious deeds, inscribing names upon the Yellow Register, golden tablets, and jade slips, arrayed before the Three Clarities.

Within every hell, the Ten Directions’ Celestial Worthies of Salvation from Suffering were seen entering the Nine Dark Realms to deliver all from torment.

The Celestial Worthy universally addressed the four assemblies: "If you can receive and uphold the Golden Register and White Tablet, the Nine Perfected Wondrous Precepts, the Talisman of Longevity, and the True Talisman of Salvation from Suffering, you shall eradicate the great sins of the Nine Dark Realms and inscribe your names in the Nine Palaces.

The Youths Who Observe Fate, the Guardian Spirits of the Precepts, the Direct Talismans of the Five Emperors, and the Clerks of the Six Palaces shall naturally follow the writ’s text to shelter and protect the precept-receiving disciples."

Now, for your sake, the Nine Perfected Wondrous Precepts and the merits of receiving and upholding the Golden Register and White Tablet shall be expounded—to deliver from peril, to relieve suffering, with divine power beyond comprehension.

All spirits bow their heads in reverence, humbly receiving the teachings and commands.

The Heavenly Worthy proclaims:

First: reverence and deference, filial piety and care for parents.
Second: diligence and loyalty to one’s lord and sovereign.
Third: non-killing, compassionate deliverance of all beings.
Fourth: non-lechery, rectifying the body and dwelling in integrity.
Fifth: non-theft, extending righteousness and diminishing the self.
Sixth: non-anger, forsaking violence and aggression toward others.
Seventh: non-deceit, abandoning flattery and harm to the good.
Eighth: non-arrogance, casting off pride and contempt for the Perfect Truth.
Ninth: non-duality, upholding the precepts with single-minded devotion.

The Guardian Spirits of the Precepts, the Mandate of the Primordial Beginning, the Golden Register and White Tablet, and the True Talisman of Salvation from Suffering now proclaim to the ten directions of the boundless worlds, to the Three Bureaus and Nine Offices, the One Hundred Twenty Courts, the Examiners of the Five Emperors, the Nine Dark Hells, the Mighty Heavenly Enforcers, the Divine Soldiers of Punishment, the Registrars of Destiny, the Recorders of Merit, the Executors of Death, the Ox-Headed Wardens, and the Great Demons of the Three Realms:

Deliver the divine soul of so-and-so, extricating it from hell, forever parting from eternal night, beholding the light. All sins shall be purged, all grievances resolved. By the merit of this deliverance through the Nine Perfected Wondrous Precepts, ascend to the heavens, all as commanded.

The Mandate of the Primordial Beginning, the Golden Register and White Tablet, and the Talisman of Longevity now proclaim to the Southern Cinnabar Heavenly Realm, the Vermilion Numinous Fire Bureau, the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace, the Great Lord of Longevity, the Venerable Han and Sima, the Registrars of Destiny, the Extenders of Lifespan, the Divine Deliverers from Calamity, the Reanimators of the Dead, and the Overseers of Life:

Exalt the divine soul of so-and-so, ascending to the Vermilion Palace, the Courtyard of Flowing Fire, where jade pupils refine the form and yellow blossoms purify the body. Inscribe the name upon the purple register, receiving transformation and rebirth. By the merit of this deliverance through the Golden Register, ascend moment by moment, all as commanded.

May the delivered soul of the departed so-and-so, after receiving this deliverance, forever serve in salvation, in the human realm and the heavens, reverently believing and practicing, all in accordance with the Mysterious Statutes and Ordinances.

**Incantation of the Golden Portal’s Lord, Transmitted to Xu Jingyang for the Salvation of Ancestral Spirits**
Oṃ hūṃ trāḥ līḥ.
Oṃ, the Primal Origin generates heaven; Oṃ, the Primal Origin generates earth; Oṃ, the Primal Origin generates humanity.
The Two Modes complete the transformation, and the myriad things flourish.
If humans fail to preserve their wholeness, they transform into yin spirits.
If spirits fail to preserve their wholeness, they degenerate into lower ghosts.
Oṃ, upon hearing my jade-like voice, the ghostly form shall vanish.
Abandoning that ghostly form, ascend to the celestial abode.
Oṃ, upon hearing my jade-like voice, those in the human realm shall instantly renounce their mortal karma, attaining long life as immortals, sharing the lifespan of heaven and earth, and the radiance of sun and moon.
One’s own body receives grace, and the seven ancestors are honored.
Having delivered the seven ancestors, one dwells in the Jade Purity.
Oṃ, upon hearing my kingly voice, those in the celestial realm shall instantly increase their celestial blessings, forever extinguishing past karma, never falling to the lower heavens, and eternally abiding in the Jade Purity.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Primal Origin’s Lord’s universal salvation of myriad spirits, as decreed.

This incantation may be recited daily to universally deliver all true registers.

*Scripture of the Jade Mirror of the Numinous Treasure, Scroll Twenty-Eight Concluded*
*Scripture of the Jade Mirror of the Numinous Treasure, Scroll Twenty-Nine*

The Illumination of the Gates of Darkness

When the primordial qi first divided, the Two Modes took their places. Yin, as the heavy and turbid qi, congealed into earth; yang, as the light and pure qi, floated into heaven. Where yin and yang intermingled and fused, the harmonious blackness of the Center coalesced in man. Thus, the nurturing of the Three Powers and the generation of the myriad transformations arise from nothing but the wondrous flow of the one qi.

Moreover, human nature is originally pure, luminous, and subtly wondrous—empty, penetrating, and spiritually communicative. Hell and heaven are utterly non-existent. Yet due to differences in nature and habit, human desires sprout and grow. From thought arises emotion, from emotion accumulates karma, and as karma encounters circumstances, it manifests accordingly, leading to sinking or rising in accordance with retribution. Thus, those of good kind belong to yang, while those of evil kind belong to yin. Therefore, the affairs of heaven and hell are truly brought about by a single thought of good or evil.

Hence, in the great methods of the Numinous Treasure, there is the principle of lighting lamps to break open hells and deliver the stagnant and rescue the hidden. This must first begin with the inner arising of mysterious illumination, to brighten the originally wondrous and non-existent wisdom-lamp of heaven. Then, one illuminates the inherent awakened nature of all beings, causing lamps to connect in succession, inwardly and outwardly pervading with clarity. Thereby, the innocent are released, goodness is pursued, and transgressions are distanced. Then, in an instant, one transcends and is transformed within the domain of the lofty, bright, upright, and great, suddenly awakening to the originally pure and natural Dao. Where then are the so-called roots of sin and evil karma? Hell and heaven alike return to emptiness and quiescence. Yet how can one not be cautious of thoughts of good and evil?

---

**Method for Crafting the Staff of Strategy**

The method states: For crafting the staff of strategy, one must select a propitious day in a renowned mountain, blessed land, pure domain, or numinous site. Take a single stalk of sweet bamboo facing the sun, five feet and five inches in length, with nine nodes in total. Enshrine it in a clean place. Choose days such as *jiǎ-wǔ*, *bǐng-wǔ*, or *dīng-mǎo*, or the third day of the third month, the seventh day of the seventh month, or the ninth day of the ninth month.

At the second node from the top, make a slight curve to the left. Below the third node, open apertures on all four sides to receive the inner talismans of the Five Peaks, and fill it with the middle section of the Numinous Scriptures. Seal each with yellow wax. For those who carry it with focused intent, use a yellow silk bag.

When performing rituals, attach a small yellow pennant, seven inches long, inscribed on the front with the *Ten Heavenly Transformations Talisman* and on the back with the *Mighty Chapter of the Azure Mystery*. Suspend it below the second node.

With prolonged use, pointing the staff to heaven will cause celestial spirits to present themselves in reverence; pointing to earth will cause earth deities to offer welcome; pointing to the four directions and the eight boundaries will cause the myriad ghosts to restrain their forms; pointing to the dark prisons of hell will cause sinful souls to ascend and be delivered. Over time, covering the bamboo with one’s robe can render one invisible.

When wielding the staff, knock the teeth together thirty-six times, and visualize the Five Emperors’ direct talismans, with one Golden Lad and one Jade Maiden attending the staff. With prolonged practice, five-colored flowing light will naturally radiate and shine above.

**Incantation:**

On the southern slope of Mount Tai, the primordial essence of the Supreme Origin.
Opening heaven and earth, the sweet bamboo communicates with the numinous.
True talismans guard the officers, protecting form and spirit.
Five-colored flowing light, crimson robes and golden tassels.
Assisting the perfected transcendents, traversing the hidden and dark.
Numinous bamboo, divine staff, sharing heaven’s lifespan.
Unite with me in life, align with me in accomplishment.
Beyond the myriad transformations, it substitutes for my form.
Five liberations share the same mechanism, the Three Radiant Ones.
Conjoined in brightness.
Above in heaven, below on earth, none fail to communicate with the numinous.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances.

Upon reciting the incantation, draw in the true qi of the five directions, swallowing each thirty-six times. On the Three Primes, the Eight Nodal Days, one’s life destiny, and birthdays, harmonize the qi, practice the visualization, recite the incantation, and cultivate sincerity without negligence. In unity with the Dao, over time, one will ascend together with it.

**Diagram of the Nine Heavens Lamps**
The Master says: The Nine Heavens Lamps are the Nine Goblet Lamps.

If lamp trees are not used, the lamps must be arranged on the ground. In the *Dongjing* scriptures, the First Heaven occupies the central position above the head, the Second Heaven lies to the south, the Third to the southeast, the Fourth to the west, the Fifth to the northeast, the Sixth to the northwest, the Seventh to the north, the Eighth to the southwest, and the Ninth to the east. Corresponding qi tablets are erected in each direction, with the Nine Heavens banners suspended above. The arrangement must follow this diagram precisely. Modern practitioners often begin with the First Heaven in the northeast, which contradicts the principle. This should be carefully examined and corrected.

**Nine-Tiered Lamp Talismans**
First Tier: Talisman of the Sovereign of the Earth of the Abyssal Marsh
Second Tier: Talisman of the Sovereign of the Earth of the Adamantine Marsh
Third Tier: Talisman of the Sovereign of the Earth of the Ochre Marsh
Fourth Tier: Talisman of the Sovereign of the Earth of the Lustrous Marsh

Eighth Tier: Talisman of the Sovereign of the Earth of the Great Wind Marsh
Ninth Tier: Talisman of the Sovereign of the Earth of the Abyssal Marsh of the Colorless Net

For the diagram of the Nine Goblets and Nine Tiers, a lamp tree is crafted from catalpa wood, divided into nine goblets, each holding one lamp. Below, pure earth is used to construct a three-tiered altar, round above and square below. The upper tier holds the lamps and the lamp tree, with the Nine Heavens banners suspended above the goblets. The middle tier displays the nine qi tablets and nine lamps. The lower tier bears the tablets of the Nine-Tiered Sovereigns and nine lamps. Together, the three tiers hold twenty-seven lamps. Beyond the square, the eight trigrams and eight gates are arrayed with eight lamps. Thus, the light shines upward to the Nine Heavens, illuminates the nine regions of the earth, and penetrates the Nine Lands and Nine Tiers below. The radiance traverses the nine paths, encircles the ten directions, and totals thirty-five lamps, corresponding to the thirty-five divisions, all in harmony with the Supreme Mystery.

**Diagram of the Nine Dark Prisons**
The Master says: According to the method of "Heaven’s pattern, Earth’s form," square and round serve as the model.
The Nine Dark Courts govern transgressions and judgments, their office bound to Mount Fengdu, in the southeast’s *si* region, where they reside.
Following the statutes of the Supreme Perfected of Great Unity, fashion nine altars of sand and soil, each two inches square. The nine altars together span six feet, embodying Earth’s utmost yin in the image of two sixes.
Each altar’s four corners curve thrice, resembling a prison’s shape.
Three lamps burn brightly at each prison, twenty-seven lamps in all.
At the heart of each prison, erect a tablet facing its direction. Inscribe upon it the *Talisman for Breaking Hell* and the *Dharma Gate of the Offering Ritual*, with the prison’s name written on the reverse. Suspend nine banners above.
When the banners are raised to open the gates and shatter the Nine Prisons, burn the nine banners, then hang them upon their poles.
First, raise the *Yellow Banner for Guiding Spirits Home*, so that the dark souls may behold it—all ten thousand sins are extinguished.

The Nine Dark Realms reside in the central palace of the Eight Trigrams.
According to the divisions of the Nine Provinces, each is overseen by local deities.
In Heaven, they are the Nine Heavens; on Earth, the Nine Palaces; their transformed forms become the Nine Dark Prisons.
Their names are nine, yet all arise from a single *qi*, a single thought’s resonance.
For every evil thought of the deceased, a prison manifests, and retribution follows.
Thus, the Most High, in boundless compassion, established this ritual offering to deliver the suffering souls. Know well its origin.

**Names of the Nine Dark Realms:**
1. Dark Nether (*Youming*)
2. Dark Yin (*Youyin*)
3. Dark Night (*Youye*)
4. Dark Feng (*Youfeng*)
5. Dark Capital (*Youdu*)
6. Dark Tribunal (*Youzhi*)
7. Dark Pass (*Youguan*)
8. Dark Bureau (*Youfu*)
9. Dark Radiance (*Youguang*)

Generally, the construction of the Nine Prisons serves to universally deliver the sunken and lost.
If the rite is small in scale—failing to honor the sovereign and all under Heaven above, or to deliver the nine ancestors and the six paths below, but only saving one or two souls—how could the Celestial Emperor issue a special pardon, opening all Nine Prisons for a single person? Such a thing is impossible.
Not all hells can be shattered, nor all dark souls delivered.
If one’s intent lacks even the slightest merit of benefiting others, it contradicts the ritual’s true purpose.
For private offerings, lighting lamps and reciting praises—or constructing nine cups of lamps—suffices.
The *Rite for Breaking Prisons* need not be performed, lest one commit presumption and blasphemy.
A filial child repaying a parent need only exhaust sincerity in repentance—how could one assume their ancestor *must* have fallen into hell and thus perform this rite? Such is the principle.
If one truly wishes to proceed, adapt the ritual as circumstances allow: prepare offerings of grain, deliver the sunken souls, and build merit according to one’s capacity. Then, the *Breaking Prisons* rite may be performed without impropriety.

For countless suffering souls, lost in delusion, a single misguided thought may consign them to prison for eternity.
Without beseeching Heaven’s decree, enacting talismans, and breaking the dark realms, how could they find liberation? Thus, follow the method precisely.

The Master says: According to the *True Person’s Twenty-Four Precepts Sutra*, those who commit twenty-four kinds of sins in life undergo twenty-four retributions after death, manifesting as twenty-four hells.
The Three Wretched Paths, Five Sufferings, and Eight Perils comprise eight hells, totaling twenty-four.
Corresponding to the human body’s three divisions and eight luminaries, and the twenty-four spirits.
Most arise from worldly attachments to desires, scheming in perverse states, knotting and coagulating impurities, unable to open and flow freely.

Thus, the *Alliance of Perfection Ritual Canon* prescribes the **Returning Radiance** method, borrowing the yang-light to pierce through the gloom of the crossroads, compelling hell’s officials to cease their judgments and allowing imprisoned sufferers to depart. May it deliver the souls of so-and-so and all hidden and radiant spirits, liberating them from the shadowy realms to behold the light of illumination.

The Mysterious Luminous Purple Tablet, the Lofty Void of Primordial Simplicity, the Perfected Dawn of the True Origin—where the Three Qi repose within the Eight Vistas of Jade Purity, radiantly illuminating the Nine Crossroads. Through wondrous awakening and transformation, the Chart of Emergent Azure begins its work; through responsive resonance and cyclic rebirth, the Jeweled Capital of demon-quelling is dissolved. The essence of the magic fungus refines their substance, granting them free passage in the imperial chariot.

*Lingbao Jade Mirror, Scroll Thirty-Two*
**The Jade Origin Pursuit and Deliverance Gate**

The Dao’s capacity to encompass the cosmos and nurture the myriad things arises entirely from the wondrous workings of spontaneity—how could it ever involve retribution? Yet with beings, it is otherwise. The qi that dwells within form is but fleeting dust, and from the moment a thought of good or evil arises, retribution inevitably follows.

Thus, the Great Rites of the Numinous Treasure include the *Jade Origin Pursuit and Deliverance* protocol, specifically for delivering the souls of those who died in childbirth or blood-related deaths. Given that their karmic entanglements have already accumulated and the conditions for retribution swiftly follow—drowning them in the rivers of desire and seas of craving—how much more so when they fall into gestation, suffer bodily harm, or perish in blood and filth? The stench of their defilement defies description.

Though their physical forms may be gone, their lingering attachments remain unextinguished. Therefore, they must be cleansed in the pure, vast source of the Forest of Judgment, washing away the stains of their past impurities. Through the light of true yang and perfect goodness, their original nature is awakened. The Purple Essence clarifies their Dao, and the Jade Talisman transports their spirits.

Thus, their illusory karmic bonds and phantom shadows dissolve like fallen blossoms, while their wondrous true bodies shine like the moon in the sky—utterly unobstructed, equal to the vast emptiness. How could this not be beneficial?

The Master says: The Gorge Stone Prison lies in the southeast of the Iron Enclosure. There stands a great stone, broad above and tapering below, with a narrow fissure at its center. Ghosts who enter it are naturally drenched in a hundredfold of poisonous juices, tormenting their bodies and minds. To the north of this prison is the Blood Lake Great Prison, the most defiled of all. Within it, women who died in childbirth endure suffering for countless kalpas—an agony beyond measure, truly pitiable.

When delivering the souls of those who died in blood or childbirth, one must first dispatch talismanic commands to the specialized officials overseeing childbirth, who will purge the filth and transform the Blood Lake. Only then may the deliverance proceed. The pardon must be memorialized three days prior, and only after its completion may the rites of summoning and gathering commence.

Upon arriving at the ritual arena, the Dharma Master must first perform the purification of defilements and petition the Heavenly Physicians for healing. Only thereafter may the souls sequentially receive offerings and precepts. If one merely performs a generic pursuit and deliverance without discernment, there will inevitably be places the talismans cannot reach—this must be carefully heeded in practice.

Grace extends to the springs’ depths, blessings reach the Blood Lake. The primal womb’s knots disperse, accumulated filth is swept away. Wisdom’s light receives them above, ascending to the celestial thoroughfares.

We deliver the departed soul of [Name], or universally all souls of women who died in childbirth, that they may ascend by this talismanic command at this very moment. As this proclamation is issued, let it be conveyed by wind and fire.

On the day and hour of this year and month, proclaimed below.

Summoning the Gate of Hidden Spirits

The nature of the Dao is equality, vast and unbounded—augmented yet not increased, diminished yet not diminished. Near yet not proximate, distant yet not remote. Gathered into one, it is not lacking; dispersed into ten thousand, it is not excessive. Be it heaven, humanity, sages, or commoners, there was never any difference. Yet sentient beings, gradually stained by karmic consciousness, drift from their origin and root. A hair’s deviation becomes a thousand *li* of error. Thus, the noble and the base diverge sharply, the common and the sacred stand worlds apart, and myriad distinctions arise between self and other.

Therefore, the Great Rites of the Numinous Treasure possess the principle of summoning and gathering hidden spirits. Through divine power and majesty, they universally deliver heaven and humanity, yet still fear that beings in all destinies may remain mired, never fully realizing the mystery of the Dharma-nature. Thus, with the pure and spontaneous wondrous light of the Numinous Treasure, they universally gather and deliver, so that the ten directions become unimpeded and the myriad realms perfectly fused. Then the sage and the common within the heart, heaven and earth within the nature, the vast and the minute become one, without lack or excess. This is the wondrous meaning of the True One, non-dual—how could it be otherwise?

*Text for Summoning the Six Destinies’ Twenty-Four Classes of Lonely Spirits*
(See the *Procedural Standards* section.)

*Mudra for Summoning the Six Destinies*
For the **Heavenly Immortal Path**, trace the *Zi* character, visualizing oneself ascending through the Heavenly Gate on a flying cloud of precious light.
For the **Divine Path**, trace the *Chou* character, visualizing oneself emerging from the Earthly Gate on Brahma-*qi*, riding the wind-horse to the left.
For the **Human Path**, trace the *Yin* character, visualizing oneself entering through the Human Gate on precious light to the right.
For the **Hell Path**, the *Shen* character; for the **Hungry Ghost Path**, the *You* character; for the **Animal Path**, the *Xu* character.
Recite the *Three Offices’ Northern Fengdu* incantation, emit wisdom-light from the eyes, fly the Dipper, and with both hands form the Jade Clarity Mudra to guide the *qi*. As if from a river’s course, exhale two streams of *qi* from the nose, merging them. Circulate the Great One’s spherical light from heaven downward, illuminating and breaking the hidden yin—all souls follow the light to the altar.

*Incantation:*

*Lingbao Yujian, Scroll Thirty-Three Concludes*
*Lingbao Yujian, Scroll Thirty-Four*

**The Gate of Arrayed Pavilions for Dispensation and Transformation**

The body of the Dao resembles emptiness, yet it contains all and transforms all—how could it be confined to a single corner? Consider how the moon emerges in the heavens: wherever there is water, its reflection is present without fail. Or how thunder resounds upon the earth: wherever it is heard, its echo responds without exception. The nature of the Dharma is likewise—still and empty, it can respond to all things. If one extends the mind of constant goodness to save beings and things, its transformative power will reach everywhere without limit.

Thus, the obstructions of sentient beings obscure their original luminosity. The eye-root clings to phenomena, turning to manifold defilements and creating karmic conditions. In life, they suffer invasion by illness, leading to injury, premature death, or incomplete forms—none attain their rightful destiny. Though the body perishes in death, deluded thoughts persist. Therefore, through the great methods of the *Lingbao*, a dispensation is arrayed: by the wondrous transformation of the Primordial Beginning, their original nature is restored. Heavenly karma and karmic consciousness are severed, wholesome roots flourish—what illness, distress, or suffering could remain?

As the scripture says: *"My great affliction is that I have a body. When I no longer have a body, what affliction remains?"* Now that the body is empty, illusory, and dissolved—like clouds dispersing to reveal the bright moon—no longer clinging to the dust of form, no longer entangled in the transformations of the ten thousand conditions, how could this be discussed in words or captured in writing?

**Establishing the Celestial Bureau of Medicine**
Your servant humbly and reverently invokes the Divine Ancestor, the Holy Farmer, Emperor of Heavenly Medicine, the Great Sage of the Nine Heavens, the Highly Exalted Divine Envoy of Wondrous Salvation, the True Lord of Pulse-Diagnosis, the Numinous Youth of Medicinal Attendants, the Merit Officers of Disease Treatment, the Needle-Holding Youths, the Divine Kings *Lu* and *Bian*, the Medical Officials of the Five Offices, the Healing Officers of the Six Ministries, the Clerks of the Five Phases, the Doctors of Disease Verification, the Perfected Ones of Disease Examination, the Marshal of the Nine Heavens, the Holy Mother of the Protective Chamber, the Great Spirit of Life-Monitoring, the Lord of Embryonic Birth, the Lord of Life-Protection, the Lord of Parturition, the Lord of Swift Birth, the Mother of Enhanced Protection, the Lady of Washing and Purification, the Merit Officers of Childbirth in the Numinous Treasure Bureau, the Merit Officers of Removing Dead Fetuses, and all immortals and officials of the Celestial Bureau of Medicine.

Your servant has heard that as the two qi revolve, there is still the principle of eventual resolution after adversity.
As sentient beings dwell in the world, how could there be no errors or transgressions?
Once illness and affliction entangle, life and death become difficult to cure.
Your servant now summons the six paths and four modes of birth, the multitude of solitary souls and stagnant po.
Deeply concerned that in life they harbored vain desires, pursued greed and craving from past lives,
were entangled in cleverness and scheming, bound by profit and fame,
their spirits depleted, essence scattered, qi exhausted, and forms withered.
In life, they were assailed by suffering and disease; in death, their souls continue to bear affliction.
Moreover, there are all those who perished from injury or untimely death—though they became luminous ghosts,
they moan day and night.
Their souls sink in obscurity; their po stagnate in deluge.
Without deliverance through salvation, they can scarcely approach the Dharma assembly.
In reverent accord with the Dao’s compassion and the ritual’s provisions for healing,
your servant humbly invokes the ranked officials of the Celestial Bureau of Medicine and the immortal attendants of medicinal treatment.
From the Phoenix Palace, gather the Five-Colored Divine Medicines of Great Purity,
dispense them to the deceased souls, and heal all their ailments from life, treating each according to its kind.
The Wood Official disperses medicine; the Fire Official presides over moxibustion;
the Metal Official wields the needle; the Water Official administers decoctions;
the Earth Official compounds remedies.
The Medical Officials of the Five Offices unite in purpose and wholehearted effort to restore nature and completeness.
If there are those afflicted with contractures, paralysis, or lameness, summon the Divine Generals of Acupuncture and Moxibustion to treat them.
If there are those with sores, abscesses, or purulent blood diseases, summon the Envoys of External Medicine to treat them.
If there are those who died mute or with terminal illnesses, summon the Heavenly Physicians of Revivification to treat them."

For those who died with unclear symptoms, summon the Attendant of Diagnostic Restoration to treat them.
For those who died in childbirth or miscarriage, summon the Jade Immortal Holy Mother to treat them.
For those who died of fright, palpitations, or cholera, summon the Youths of Soul-Calming and Spirit-Stabilizing to treat them.
For those who died from consuming poisoned medicine or food, summon the Perfected of Life-Extension and Life-Liberation to treat them.
For those who died of cold damage or seasonal qi, summon the Divine Generals of Sweat-Induction to treat them.
For those who died with incomplete heads, summon the Attendant of Head-Restoration to treat them.
For those who died with incomplete bodies, summon the Attendant of Form-Gathering to treat them.
For those who died with missing limbs, summon the Attendant of Soul-Returning to treat them.
For those who died with lost primordial qi, summon the Attendant of Form-Completion and Qi-Gathering to treat them.
For all other conditions too numerous to mention, summon the ranked immortals and perfected to examine the symptoms and administer treatment.

Thus shall severed heads be rejoined, severed sinews be reconnected, broken bones be mended, shattered bodies be made whole, watery distension be dispelled, hangings be loosened, mud and sand be cleared, leprous worms be shed, pus and blood be purified, fetuses be delivered, birth injuries be healed, enmities be resolved, disputes be reconciled, the blind regain sight, the deaf regain hearing, the mute speak, the lame walk, the contracted stretch, sorrow and distress be instantly dispelled, thirst and exhaustion be quenched with coolness, scattered or obstructed wombs be unknotted and freed. May their qi and bodies be at peace, their forms and spirits complete, and may they swiftly transcend and be refined, reborn anew.

Your servant, with utmost reverence and trepidation before your sacred might, offers this earnest prayer.

Through your aid, all shall be preserved in life, and I, unworthy, shall gaze upon you in devotion. I now respectfully send you forth.

**Gate of Ritual Bathing and Robing**

The waters of the Flowery Pond originate from the essence of the Great Yin in the Eastern Well, their ebb and flow attuned to the sea’s tides. The source runs deep and the flow endures long—nothing exists without reliance upon water.

Yet when a person’s form has perished and their *qi* has dispersed, what substance remains to be bathed? Truly, it is because the stains of passion and desire accumulate gradually, the grime of karmic defilement obscures the clarity of the mind. What one is tainted by in life persists even in death, for the threads of worldly thought remain unsevered.

Thus, the grand rites of the Numinous Treasure tradition prescribe the ritual of bathing: internally, one mobilizes the true water of Heavenly One; externally, one prepares the orchid-scented broth of the five fragrant herbs. The Crimson Dragon stirs the source of White Stone, while the Great Mystery guides the *qi* of Yellow Blossom, washing away old impurities and reopening the primordial heaven of the departed.

When the five aggregates are empty, the five turbidities are all purified; when the one mind awakens, the ten thousand conditions are wholly cleansed. Only then may one don unstained robes and wear indestructible garments, embodying the true within the formless form, paying homage to the Three Treasures in the heaven within heaven. Such wondrous communion with the mysterious workings defies all conjecture.

*Incantation:*

Swiftly, swiftly, as the Law commands.

**Gate of Transmuting Dharma-Food**

All myriad methods arise from the mind and likewise perish within it. That which gives me life is spirit; that which slays me is the heart. Thus, when one savors the wondrous meaning, one comes to know the heart’s function—its benefits and harms are beyond enumeration.

In the beginning of human life, one is but the dwelling of a single spirit, yet to possess this heart. As the Four Great Elements provisionally coalesce, spirit congeals into heart, and the heart, with spirit as its dwelling, gradually drifts from its origin. Once the heart departs from its origin, thoughts arise in its wake. With the first thought’s attachment, a hundred actions follow. From these hundred actions, the ten thousand conditions sprout forth. Therefore, when this thought arises, if it inclines toward goodness, one becomes a celestial immortal, a human sage, or a divine spirit; if it inclines toward evil, one becomes a denizen of hell, a hungry ghost, or a beast. This is no other cause but the direction of a single thought.

Moreover, in the vast expanse of the great earth, all that possesses form and appearance is inevitably bound by the thought of hunger and cold, which persists even unto death. Thus, the Great Rites of the Numinous Treasure include the section on delivering the hidden shades, embodying the compassion of the Dao to awaken all sentient beings. Through food, the Dharma is enacted; through the Dharma, the mind is illuminated. Once the mind-Dharma is clear, what hunger or thirst remains? Therefore, this method fulfills such thoughts, casting aside delusion to return to truth. The so-called Eight Assemblies and Five Kitchens, the ambrosial nectar of ghee, the fragrant viands and precious delicacies, the jade-like liquors and crystalline essences—all are inherently present within the Dharma-body. This nature is complete in itself; why seek externally? What may be sought externally is but illusion. One must clearly recognize the great origin, deeply savor non-action, forever escape the wheel of rebirth, and realize the supreme Dao. If this principle is understood, how could it merely deliver the hidden shades?

**Visualization and Application in Transmuting Food**

In the method of transmuting food, the master visualizes the Savior from Suffering Heavenly Worthy; the altar assembly, the various Great Perfected Ones; and the ritual platform, a three-tiered precious altar. Within the vessel, crimson light and purple *qi* surge upward to the heavens. The Three Treasures, the Celestial Thearchs, the Supreme Unity Compassionate Honored One, the Ten Directions’ Savior from Suffering Perfected Ones, the sun, moon, and stars, and the true lords of the Three Realms—all manifest within the void of space to bear witness.

From the Gate of Heaven, golden light and the *qi* of the Dao descend in myriad layers, cascading endlessly to bathe one’s body and infuse the vessel of food and the water basin, illuminating both inside and out. Next, visualize five-colored radiance manifesting in the eastern quadrant as a circular image, like a lunar halo, suffusing heaven above and earth below, the ten directions’ worlds—all become brilliantly clear. Within this light, the Supreme Heavenly Worthy appears in majesty: wearing a kingfisher-jade crown and a robe of iridescent kingfisher-feathered *li* gauze, the left hand holds a luminous azure-glass goblet, the right hand grasps a feathered branch of malachite. Seated upon a nine-headed lion’s golden lotus throne, each lion’s mouth emits flames encircling the Compassionate Honored One. Within the radiant blaze, the Heavenly Worthy is further enveloped by a nine-colored orb, like the sun, from whose crown a white ray of light emanates, its brilliance shooting forth like ten thousand spears. Upon the lotus throne, thirty-six smaller lotuses bear the Heavenly Worthy’s feet. His golden countenance and jade-like visage shine with the wisdom-sun of compassion. To his left stands the Savior from Suffering Perfected One; to his right, the Great Wisdom Perfected One, attending the Heavenly Worthy. Eighty-one divine lords, the Five Directions’ Supreme Unity officials and soldiers, the Azure Mystery functionaries, the Yellow Register lads, jade maidens, golden youths, divine kings, and mighty warriors—all manifest within the eastern five-colored numinous light.

The Heavenly Worthy’s radiance suffuses heaven above and earth below, the ten directions’ worlds—all become brilliantly clear. The Heavenly Worthy scatters ambrosia, infusing the Dharma-food; auspicious *qi* and luminous essence flow endlessly. The Heavenly Worthy, the master’s perfected self, and the divine officials together recite the true mantra of ambrosia. The vessel’s transformations become boundless; fragrant vapors, rich and dense, fill the void, vast and immeasurable.

**Visualization of the Numinous Script**

First, form the Three Paths and Five Sufferings mudra once, and with each direction’s completion, visualize the corresponding *qi*. Nine for the east, three for the south, seven for the west, five for the north. Infuse the Dharma-food and draw in the water basin with a breath. Repeat once more, visualizing yellow *qi* converging from the five directions, the light of the sun, moon, and stars drawing the *qi* of the thirty-two heavens, interweaving and interlacing to bathe the Dharma-food. Recite the mantra three times.

Visualize red light from the four directions enveloping the altar. After a while, it coalesces into a five-colored rainbow, descending to suffuse the master’s body, mouth, and five viscera, merging into a great orb that broadly covers and fills the void. The master’s body abides as if within the solar palace. The vessel spontaneously generates: one becomes two, two become three, three generate nine, and from the nine-nines’ number, transformations become boundless. From earth to heaven, the ten directions are filled to abundance—vast and immeasurable. Heavenly spirits and earthly deities, the six paths and four births—all partake to satiety.

The Gate of Severing the Corpse and Transcending the Five Portals

In the great methods of the Numinous Treasure, there exists the Dao of "Severing the Corpse, Transcending the Five Portals, and Consigning the Celestial Spirits to the Treasury." Thus the scripture states: "Invoke the extinction of the Three Evils, sever the root of earthly bonds, soar through the Five Portals, and inscribe your name in the Supreme Mystery." The Three Evils and Five Sufferings all arise from habit and this heart, which is truly the origin of all karmic misdeeds.

Now, humans receive life from the qi of the axes and the Five Phases, inherently luminous and pure, free from defilement. Gradually, as the human heart drifts from the root toward the branches, it pursues delusion and loses the real. The bitter retributions and evil affinities revolve endlessly, drowning one in ceaseless torrent, forgetting the way back. To return to the origin becomes impossible.

Thus, one must rely on the wondrous Dao of purity, stillness, non-action, and spontaneity to awaken the unawakened nature—indestructible and unadulterated. With a firm and sharp blade, sever the unsevered affinities, enabling one to trace the current back to the source, return to truth, and awaken to the root. This is called "emptying the Five Aggregates," whereby the Five Sufferings naturally dissolve. Realizing the wondrous Three Origins, the Three Evils naturally vanish.

Thereafter, assume the form of the Great Dipper’s Celestial Pivot, uniting the true qi of the Two Forces and Five Phases. With the numbers of heaven-and-earth’s generation and completion, revert to the original numinous essence of the Great Cavern. Whether called "heaven" or "spirit," all enter the primordial treasury of the Origin’s radiant light, returning to the Ultimate of Non-Being. Hence, it is called "consigning to the treasury." What further reflection is needed?

**Method of Visualization and Application:**
The practitioner circulates one qi through the Three Passes and Five Viscera, purifying the inner and outer. Next, draw qi from the lower Cinnabar Field upward to the Mud Pill Palace, transforming it into the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning. From the crown, emit a golden light of Dao-qi, infusing the deceased soul.

Then, with a mind of resolute firmness, wield it as a sharp sword to sever the Three Corpses. The left hand seals the jade script, while the right brandishes the sword. Visualize the Three Officials and Five Emperors severing the corpse and transcending the portals, with spirit-officials arrayed in solemn ranks before you.

Instruct the patron of the rite to hold the banner. Arrange three piles of paper money in the shape of the Three Terraces. Burn one talisman over each pile, and with the sword, sever and extinguish the Three Corpses. Sprinkle the consecrated water, visualizing the deceased’s heart generating virtuous thoughts, the Three Evils forever dissolved.

Next, with a single qi of golden light, guide and escort the deceased soul to soar through the Five Portals. At the moment of practice, if not a single thought arises, all affinities naturally diminish.

Begin by announcing the proceedings.

**Lingbao Jade Mirror Scroll 38: Refining and Rebirth Gate.**

Before Heaven and Earth were born,
the **Primordial Void** [至虚无] reigned supreme.
The body reached the **Ultimate Extremity of Emptiness** [虚极],
then transformed into **Spirit** [神].
Spirit refined into **Qi** [氣],
and **Qi** coalesced into **Form** [形].

Trace its origin—
nothing exists without relying on **Qi**.
Examine its end—
nothing persists without returning to **Form**.
Thus, the myriad transformations stem from **Form-Qi** [形气],
while **Form-Qi** originates from **Spirit-Luminance** [神明],
and **Spirit-Luminance** from the **Primordial Void** [虚无].

What Heaven endows is **Fate** [命],
what things receive is **Nature** [性].
**Fate** is **Qi**,
**Nature** is **Spirit**.
When **Spirit** condenses, **Qi** transforms—
the **Dao** [道] lies within this process.

Since **Qi** transforms, there is **Birth** [生],
and **Birth** entails **Death** [死]—
this is the natural order.
Since **Spirit** refines, there is no **Birth**,
and no **Birth** means no **Death**—
this too is the natural order.

Thus, when **Qi** transforms, there are **Things** [物],
and when **Spirit** refines, there are no **Boundaries** [方].
For those who have perished,
when **Form-Qi** disperses and the **Four Great Elements** [四大] return to emptiness,
what remains is their **serene, enduring essence** [湛然若存者].
If they are not yet enlightened,
this is why the **Lingbao Great Method** [灵宝大法] has the path of **Refining and Rebirth** [炼度更生].

Externally, arrange **Water and Fire** [水火],
internally, harmonize the **Kan-Li* Hexagrams** [坎离].
Use the **Nine Qi** [九炁] to nurture their **Spirit** [神],
and the **Five Sprouts** [五芽] to embody their **Qi**.
Combine the **Three Lights** [三光] to illuminate the scene,
cycle ten times to restore the **Soul** [灵],
each following its own inherent method.

Yet, one must use the **Mysterious Primordial Yang Qi** [妙无真阳之气],
the **Formless Essence** [具无质之质],
the **Complete Purity within True Reality** [全真中之真],
to perfect this **Sacred Embryo** [圣胎] and **True Form** [法身].
Then, **Spirit** refines naturally,
transcending the **Two Qi** [二炁] and **Five Phases** [五行].

What is neither born nor extinguished
arises from the **Marvelous Essence of the Body** [即身之妙].
If one attains this **Marvelous Essence of the Body**,
then **True Reality** [真] is naturally achieved—
one may then forget the **fishing pole after catching the fish** [得鱼而后忘筌].

Moreover, the **Daoist** [道者] is the master of **Spirit** [神],
**Spirit** is the master of **Qi** [氣],
and **Qi** is the master of **Form** [形].
Thus, refining **Form** unites with **Qi**,
refining **Qi** unites with **Spirit**,
refining **Spirit** unites with the **Primordial Void** [虚].
Then only the **Dao** [道] remains as **Spirit** [神],
and **Form** [形] becomes the **Great Void** [太虚].

This is the **Golden Elixir Refining Form** [金液炼形],
the **Jade Talisman Preserving Spirit** [玉符保神],
where **Form** and **Spirit** are both wondrous,
and align with the **True Dao** [合真者].

The **Refining and Rebirth Method** [炼度更生之道] is indeed unassailable.
